name: European Casino Association
membership: Associate member of the European Association for the Study of Gambling (EASG)
memberOrga: The ECA has 30 member countries from across Europe (both EU and non-EU), the full list can be found on the ECA website: http://www.europeancasinoassociation.org/about-eca/eca-members/
goal: The ECA represents licensed land-based casinos in Europe, with 30 member countries and over 70,000 direct employees supporting local economies across Europe. It has members from nearly all EU Member States, as well as non-EU countries. The main purpose and objective of the ECA is to address and promote issues related to casinos and promote the positive contribution of the industry.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Anti-Money Laundering
Other gambling-related initiatives and activities from the EU institutions
